1. Open Waste Trace¶

1.1. What is it?¶

A wrapper around Sistri’s Web Services Soap API using Suds and SQLAlchemy.

1.2. Requirements¶

The two dependencies is the suds SOAP module, which is available at:

  • https://fedorahosted.org/suds/

and the SQLalchemy database abstraction library, which is available at:

  • http://www.sqlalchemy.org/

You may also use easy_install or pip to install from PyPi.

1.3. Installation¶

As root/admin on your machine:

python setup.py install

1.4. Documentation¶

For documentation, see the project webpage at:

  • http://www.openwastetrace.it

There are also a lot of useful examples under the examples directory within this directory.

1.5. Support¶

Head over to http://www.openwastetrace.it and submut an issue if you have any problems or questions.
